UserReviews.quote: Super! I've waited years for a product like this, and it's finally here. Can't wait to try all the flavors that were delivered!
Magnificent! Ice cream from this machine is simply delicious.
I've tasted better, and I've tasted worse. It's acceptable by my standards.
Having this smart little helper at home making ice cream for me, I have time to soak in the tub. Awesome!
I was so happy when it arrived. Too bad the company hasn't invested more in the technology. However, I was underwhelmed by the ice cream expulsion pressure.
Nice! I can make my own tomato ice cream.
Unfortunately, this appliance only comes with a limited range of flavors, none of which I like and the ice cream it makes is way too cold. Such a shame.
Ice Cream, you scream. Because it's too damn cold. That's basically the only problem I have with this product.
